attributes.action: PLACE ON THE EMPTY PLINTH IN TRAFALAGAR SQUARE A STATUTE OF A WW1 SOLDEIR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As this year marked the death of the last surviving serviceman of WW1.  I would petition Downing Street for a statue to be placed on the empty plinth in Trafalgar Square of a WW1 Serviceman in Battledress enscribed with the  words "Tommy Atkins - WW1"

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
